casebody.data:
In re D.B., C.B. No. 590A07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 14, 2008. Elizabeth Kennedy-Gurnee, Fayetteville, for Cumberland County DSS. Janet K. Ledbetter, Hillsborough, for Father. Beth A. Hall, for Guardian ad Litem.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th day of January 2008 by Respondent (Mother) for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Respondent (Mother) shall have up to and including the 13th day of February 2008 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 14th day of January 2008."
